question: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and I've been able to control it through my diet. Which i get 30 carb breakfast 15 snack 45 lunch 15 snack and 45 dinner. But seriously every time i go to the store to get groceries it is hard not to get something i can't have because it seams like EVERYTHING has a large amount of carbs. Obviously i won't for the sake of my daughter but grrr i just want some ice cream :( lol
title: i want carbs!
